stages.logText: Facutloni asked me to help him deliver all of the items ordered by his customers a long time ago. He even gave me an old document with the names and items written on it.
Arcir the Fallhaven book-lover ordered a 'Dusty Old book'.
Edrin the Brimhaven metalsmith ordered a 'Striped Hammer'.
Odirath the Stoutford armorer ordered a 'Pretty Porcelain Figure'.
Venanra the Brimhaven laundress ordered an 'Old, worn cape'.
Tjure the unlucky Brimhaven merchant ordered a 'Mysterious green something'.
Servant the Guynmart servant ordered a 'Chandelier'.
Arghes at Remgard tavern ordered 'Yellow boots'.
Wyre the mournful Vilegard woman ordered a 'Lyre'.
Mikhail ordered a 'Plush Pillow'.
Pangitain the Brimhaven fortune teller ordered a 'Crystal Globe'.
Facutloni wants me to report back after the deliveries are complete.
I reported back to Facutloni. He is very happy.
I delivered 'Dusty Old book'
I delivered 'Striped Hammer'
I delivered 'Pretty Porcelain Figure'
I delivered 'Old, worn cape'
I delivered 'Mysterious green something'
I delivered 'Chandelier'
I delivered 'Yellow boots'
I delivered 'Lyre'
I delivered 'Plush Pillow'
I delivered 'Crystal Globe'

name: Gold and Exp reward for Delivery quest completed - nondisplay

stages.logText: Not yet done.
Done. But haven't received gold and exp reward yet.
Done. I received gold and exp reward. Old scrooge again.
